$Marty Perez came to bat even though he had made the last out the previous inning; after a pitch for a ball, Phillies catcher McCarver pointed out that Perez was the incorrect batter; the Braves inserted Breazeale as pinch-hitter with 1-0 count and he proceeded to strike out; Phillies should have waited to protest unless and until Perez reached base

ej,luccf801,M,colon901,Automatic for 2 trips to mound on same batter ej,branb102,P,colon901,Automatic for 2 trips to mound on same batter $Phillies manager Lucchesi and pitcher Brandon ejected by HP umpire Colosi when coach made two trips to mound; coach Ripplemyere visited mound and started back, leaving the mound circle; he then went back to the mouns which was a second visit with same batter at bat; rule calls for automatic ejection of the pitcher and the manager, but Brandon had to stay in game to complete Kingman's plate appearance
